block.p: American Express Publishing is expected to announce today that its new president and chief executive will be Ed Kelly, the publisher of the company's Travel & Leisure group.

Mr. Kelly, whose group publishes Travel & Leisure and its spinoffs, T&L Golf and Travel & Leisure Family, will succeed Daniel B. Brewster, who resigned two weeks ago to become the chief executive of Gruner & Jahr, a unit of Bertelsmann A.G.
American Express Publishing is expected to announce today that its new president and chief executive will be Ed Kelly, the publisher of the company's Travel & Leisure group.

Mr. Kelly, whose group publishes Travel & Leisure and its spinoffs, T&L Golf and Travel & Leisure Family, will succeed Daniel B. Brewster, who resigned two weeks ago to become the chief executive of Gruner & Jahr, a unit of Bertelsmann A.G.

American Express Publishing, which is a partnership between the Time Inc. unit of Time Warner and the American Express Company, publishes four consumer magazines, including Food & Wine and Travel & Leisure and specialty publications for American Express customers, like Departures magazine.
